name: Phong Nha – Hanoi – Ha Long Bay Cruise
description: Ha Long Bay, located in the Gulf of Tonkin, within Quang Ninh Province in the northeast of Vietnam. It is 165 km from the capital of Ha Noi. Covering an area of 43,400 ha and including over 1600 islands and islets, most of them still stay intact. It forms a spectacular seascape of limestone pillars.  It is an ideal model of a mature Karst landscape developed during a warm and wet tropical climate. The property’s exceptional scenic beauty is complemented by its great biological interest.
